pages.text: With a cutting board, you can chop your meat and crops into smaller pieces to cook with them more efficiently. You'll need to craft a knife. You can quickly chop up entire stacks by putting the ingredient in your off-hand and your knife in your main hand.
The Stove is a more refined campfire. It can cook 6 items at a time instead of just 4. Cooked items will still pop off, so be ready to catch them.

What's better than a hot meal after a long day of engineering? With the Cooking Pot, the culinary world is unlocked to you. It needs to be placed on top of a Campfire or Stove (or on top of a Hopper that's on top of one of those blocks).
If you prefer, you can also cook items on the Skillet (as long as it is above a Stove or Campfire). It can hold a stack at a time. Cooked items will pop off.

pages.title: Alternative Automation
pages.text: You can also automate Cutting Board recipes with a $(l:compat/kinetic_machines/slicer)Slicer$(), and Cooking Pot recipes using the $(l:kinetic_machines/whisk)Mechanical Whisk$().
